languages.text: "От одной мысли, что в переборках нашего корабля заведется бешеный ксенос, сердце мне защемило... нет уж, вытащить эту дрянь и либо на цепь, либо, простите меня за резкость, Лорд-капитан — прихлопнуть и забыть".

"The prospect of having a rabid xenos crawling inside our bulkheads makes my heart sink... No, we ought to drag him out, then we either put him on a chain or — forgive my bluntness, Lord Captain — we swat him down and forget that he ever existed."
languages.original_text: "От одной мысли, что в переборках нашего корабля заведется бешеный ксенос, сердце мне защемило... нет уж, вытащить эту дрянь и либо на цепь, либо, простите меня за резкость, Лорд-капитан — прихлопнуть и забыть".

traits.locale_text: "The prospect of having a rabid xenos crawling inside our bulkheads makes my heart sink... No, we ought to drag him out, then we either put him on a chain or — forgive my bluntness, Lord Captain — we swat him down and forget that he ever existed."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The prospect of having a rabid xenos crawling inside our bulkheads makes my heart sink... No, we ought to drag him out, then we either put him on a chain or — forgive my bluntness, Lord Captain — we swat him down and forget that he ever existed."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « L'idée qu'un xénos enragé puisse se cacher derrière nos cloisons m'est insupportable... Non, il faut le débusquer et l'enchaîner, ou, pardonnez ma franchise, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, l'abattre et oublier jusqu'à son existence. »
languages.original_text: "The prospect of having a rabid xenos crawling inside our bulkheads makes my heart sink... No, we ought to drag him out, then we either put him on a chain or — forgive my bluntness, Lord Captain — we swat him down and forget that he ever existed."

traits.locale_text: « L'idée qu'un xénos enragé puisse se cacher derrière nos cloisons m'est insupportable... Non, il faut le débusquer et l'enchaîner, ou, pardonnez ma franchise, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, l'abattre et oublier jusqu'à son existence. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「狂暴な異種族が隔壁の中を這いずり回っていると思うと、胸が締め付けられる思いです…いえ、引きずり出して鎖につないでおくか、あるいは…無礼をお許しください、ロード・キャプテン。叩き潰して生きていたことすら忘れさせるべきです」
languages.original_text: "The prospect of having a rabid xenos crawling inside our bulkheads makes my heart sink... No, we ought to drag him out, then we either put him on a chain or — forgive my bluntness, Lord Captain — we swat him down and forget that he ever existed."

traits.locale_text: 「狂暴な異種族が隔壁の中を這いずり回っていると思うと、胸が締め付けられる思いです…いえ、引きずり出して鎖につないでおくか、あるいは…無礼をお許しください、ロード・キャプテン。叩き潰して生きていたことすら忘れさせるべきです」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: “一想到有发疯的异形在我们的船上到处肆虐，我的心情就无比沉重……不行，我们应该把他拖出来，把他拴起来，或者……请原谅我的直言不讳，舰长大人……或者我们干脆把他干掉，假装他从一开始就不存在。”
languages.original_text: "The prospect of having a rabid xenos crawling inside our bulkheads makes my heart sink... No, we ought to drag him out, then we either put him on a chain or — forgive my bluntness, Lord Captain — we swat him down and forget that he ever existed."

traits.locale_text: “一想到有发疯的异形在我们的船上到处肆虐，我的心情就无比沉重……不行，我们应该把他拖出来，把他拴起来，或者……请原谅我的直言不讳，舰长大人……或者我们干脆把他干掉，假装他从一开始就不存在。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Die Vorstellung, dass ein tollwütiger Xenos durch unsere Module kriecht, lässt mir das Herz in den Magen sinken ... Nein, wir sollten ihn herausziehen und dann in Ketten legen oder — verzeiht meine Direktheit, Lord Captain — ihn zerquetschen und vergessen, dass er je existiert hat."
languages.original_text: "The prospect of having a rabid xenos crawling inside our bulkheads makes my heart sink... No, we ought to drag him out, then we either put him on a chain or — forgive my bluntness, Lord Captain — we swat him down and forget that he ever existed."

traits.locale_text: "Die Vorstellung, dass ein tollwütiger Xenos durch unsere Module kriecht, lässt mir das Herz in den Magen sinken ... Nein, wir sollten ihn herausziehen und dann in Ketten legen oder — verzeiht meine Direktheit, Lord Captain — ihn zerquetschen und vergessen, dass er je existiert hat."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Me da un vuelco el corazón ante la idea de tener un xenos rabioso merodeando entre nuestros mamparos... No, debemos sacarlo a rastras y luego encadenarlo, o... disculpe mi franqueza, Lord Capitán, pero si por mí fuera lo liquidaríamos y a otra cosa».
languages.original_text: "The prospect of having a rabid xenos crawling inside our bulkheads makes my heart sink... No, we ought to drag him out, then we either put him on a chain or — forgive my bluntness, Lord Captain — we swat him down and forget that he ever existed."

traits.locale_text: «Me da un vuelco el corazón ante la idea de tener un xenos rabioso merodeando entre nuestros mamparos... No, debemos sacarlo a rastras y luego encadenarlo, o... disculpe mi franqueza, Lord Capitán, pero si por mí fuera lo liquidaríamos y a otra cosa».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Bölme panellerimizin içinde kuduz bir zenonun dolanıyor olduğu düşüncesi içimi dağlıyor. Hayır, onu dışarı çıkarmalı, sonra da ya zincire vurmalı veyahut... Pervasızlığımı mazur görün Lord Kaptan, onu böcek gibi ezip varlığı tümden unutmalıyız."
languages.original_text: "The prospect of having a rabid xenos crawling inside our bulkheads makes my heart sink... No, we ought to drag him out, then we either put him on a chain or — forgive my bluntness, Lord Captain — we swat him down and forget that he ever existed."

traits.locale_text: "Bölme panellerimizin içinde kuduz bir zenonun dolanıyor olduğu düşüncesi içimi dağlıyor. Hayır, onu dışarı çıkarmalı, sonra da ya onu zincire vurmalı, ya da, pervasızlığımı mazur görün Lord Kaptan, onu böcek gibi ezip, var olduğunu komple unutmalıyız."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
